Name: Rocketboo
Desc: This Bangboo accelerates for 17.5 steps when running a hundred kilometers.

1.Name: Boom!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies within range and accumulating <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Refueling
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FF5521>Fire Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

2.Name: Refueling
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FF5521>Fire Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 125% more Anomaly Buildup.

1.Name: Ka-Boom Express Shipping
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in a large area and inflicting massive <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.
